title: BPMNExecutable
description: This is the BPMN subset stencil set for execution in Process Engine.

stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram
stencils.description: A BPMN Diagram.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the Diagram from other Diagrams.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Name is an attribute that is text description of the Diagram.

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: This holds the name of the language in which text is written.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: QueryLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of queries used in the Diagram can be understood.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.

properties.title: Pools
properties.description: A Business Process Diagramm shall contain one or more Pools.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.

stencils.title: Task
stencils.description: An atomic activity.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: The Type of Activity.

properties.title: Status
properties.description: The Status of an activity is determined when the activity is being executed by a process engine.

properties.title: Rolename
properties.description: This role with following rights has the permission to execute this task.

properties.title: Attribute list
properties.description: XForm attached manually if standard XForm doesn't suffice

stencils.title: Sub-Process
stencils.description: An subprocess.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: The Type of Activity.

properties.title: Status
properties.description: The Status of an activity is determined when the activity is being executed by a process engine.

properties: SubProcessType is an attribute that defines whether the Sub-Process details are embedded within the higher level Process or refers to another, re-usable Process. The default is Embedded.

stencils.title: AND Gateway
stencils.description: A decision point.

stencils.title: OR Gateway
stencils.description: A decision point.

stencils.title: Data-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway
stencils.description: A decision point.

stencils.title: Event-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway
stencils.description: A decision point.

stencils.title: Complex Gateway
stencils.description: A decision point.

properties.title: BoundaryVisible
properties.description: Defines, if the rectangular boundary for the Pool is visible.

stencils.title: Group
stencils.description: A group box element

stencils.title: Text Annotation
stencils.description: A text annotation

stencils.title: Data Object
stencils.description: A data object

properties.title: Name
properties.description: Text description

properties.title: DataModel
properties.description:
Do not change DataModel Structure if unsure.
Here a XML schema definition is required.

stencils.title: Start event
stencils.description: An event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Start message event
stencils.description: A message event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Start timer event
stencils.description: A timer event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Start rule event
stencils.description: A rule event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Start link event
stencils.description: A link event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Start multiple event
stencils.description: A multiple event without incoming edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate event
stencils.description: An intermediate event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate message event
stencils.description: An intermediate message event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate timer event
stencils.description: An intermediate timer event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate error event
stencils.description: An intermediate error event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate cancel event
stencils.description: An intermediate cancel event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate compensation event
stencils.description: An intermediate compensation event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate rule event
stencils.description: An intermediate rule event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate link event
stencils.description: An intermediate link event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: Intermediate multiple event
stencils.description: An intermediate multiple event with incoming and outgoing edges.

stencils.title: End event
stencils.description: An event without outgoing edges.
